p: This work was funded by the Wilhelm Doerenkamp-Stiftung, Chur, Switzerland. The funder had no role in the design and conduct of the study; collection, management, analysis, and interpretation of the data; preparation, review, or approval of the manuscript; or decision to submit the manuscript for publication. We acknowledge support from the German Research Foundation (DFG) and the Open Access Publication Fund of Charité ‐ Universitätsmedizin Berlin.
